content: what could be better than a bunny halloween costume contest honestly i don t think there is anything that can top this amount of cuteness with halloween season upon us i knew i had to throw a costume party for some of my favorite bunnies nothing says halloween like a fun costume party right while i told them to keep it simple a couple went all out with the face paint and accessories i ll let you decide who the winner is characters are a vampire frankenstein a pumpkin and a mummy pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size e/3 5mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins each character s pattern will also include what other materials you will need felt hot glue pom poms etc skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease flo- front loops only blo-back loops only half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet chain- chain slip_stitch- slip_stitch finished measurement original bunny is 4 inches wide and 5 inches tall with modifications the height of the bunny can change slightly please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
